body_html:
The preferred new way of doing prefetching is

ds.apply(prefetching_ops.copy_to_device("/gpu:0")).prefetch(1) [https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/data/python/ops/prefetching_ops.py#L355]

This should give you a regular PrefetchDataset object that you can create a regular iterator out of.

Let me know if that helps.

This should give you a regular PrefetchDataset object that you can create a regular iterator out of.
Let me know if that helps.
body:
The preferred new way of doing prefetching is 

ds.apply(prefetching_ops.copy_to_device("/gpu:0")).prefetch(1) [https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/data/python/ops/prefetching_ops.py#L355]

This should give you a regular PrefetchDataset object that you can create a regular iterator out of. 

Let me know if that helps.
